value:
I created a young woman...my twelfth
try after much heartache... Sitri.
But Sothis did not stir within her...

The Immaculate One...my true form.
You too have witnessed it, have you
not, $Nu?

My home that was lost long ago...
The voice that enveloped me...
I need it back. All of it.

I-I can no longer...contain my power.
Fódlan's fate lies in the hands of...
Grrraaahhh!

That one has...arrived in this world
too? That one who bears the Crest
Stone of the progenitor god...$k$pMy last hope...

Quickly... You must flee... I do not
wish to inflict harm upon a friend
of $Nf...

Gah! My—my Crest... I cannot
maintain control!
For the future...of Fódlan...

Does this mean...I will not be able to
achieve my goal?

All this work for the sake of...
regaining that which was lost...

I am...Rhea... Archbishop of...
the Church of Seiros...$k$pMother, I... I seek the progenitor god...
I-I seek...ah... Graaah!

I just wanted to...to get it back.
A small, precious thing... So small it
slipped between my fingers...$k$pThe smile I still see when I close my
eyes... Those gentle hands...
I can feel their embrace...$k$pMy only desire is to see my mother
one last time. I have carried on for so
long, allowing that ache to guide me...$k$pBut now, I have drifted... I am so far
from Fódlan...from home... I have
drifted to another world.$k$pIt is strange though... Even in this
land, I sense a familiar presence.
Her presence.$k$pIf I continue to fight for you, will you
let me see her? Please... May I...may I
I hear mother's voice one last time?
Gah!
Gyaaah!
Gr...
Greee!
Hrrraaagh!
Huuuh-aaahhh!
Hyaaaugh!
Grrraaah!
Gyughhh...
Hm...
I am...Rhea... Archbishop of...the Church of Seiros...
*growl* Do NOT touch me.
Why, Mother... Why?!
If only I could resurrect my mother... I could regain all that has been lost...
Please... The progenitor god's power...Mother's power... must be used to save Fódlan...
Even though I had to do some...questionable things to achieve that goal, I wished to see Sothis...my mother...once more.
When I'm with you...I can remember...peace...
Yes...
Go...where?
I am…
